breadCrumbs.text: Upload your pricing schedule and other documents

title: Upload your pricing schedule and other documents
description1: You should use a pricing schedule to set out what you want suppliers to give prices for. This will help suppliers know what you want specific costs for, and will help you evaluate them fairly.
description3: Create and upload a template for the written proposal, along with specific instructions. Upload instructions for any other chosen assessment methods.
description_title2: Core terms, call-off order form and schedules (terms and conditions)

taskList.title: Upload your core terms, call-off order form and schedules (terms and conditions) (optional)

backJump.title: Return to Write and publish your requirements
